body_content.explanation: bought or obtained not long ago:
examples: The museum will put the recently acquired Picasso on display this spring
The airline's recently acquired jumbo jet was just put into service.
According to the charter, the Crown governor is in charge of the recently acquired territory.
The new tax laws will only affect recently acquired properties or assets.

body_content.explanation: having just signed an agreement to play for a team:
examples: The forward, recently acquired at the trade deadline, brings grit and power to the offense.
The team waived a veteran player as well as the recently acquired kicker from Alabama.
The fans are hoping that the recently acquired Heisman Trophy winner can turn the team around.
